com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class ParticipantState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.ParticipantState

  • public class ParticipantState
extends Object
    Participant state. It will be passed accross different instances of Leader/Follower class during the lifetime of Zab.
